mapper.sql: BR_ID, BR_NM, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_SCH_ID, DBC_TBL_NM, DBC_COL_NM, BIZ_AREA_ID, BR_CRGP_USER_ID, AGR_NV, GL_NV, USE_YN, TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID, TGT_DB_SCH_ID, TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, TGT_DBC_COL_NM, TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
CNT_SQL, ER_CNT_SQL, ANA_SQL, TGT_CNT_SQL, TGT_ER_CNT_SQL, TGT_ANA_SQL
mapper.select:
SELECT A.BR_NM AS BR_NM -- 업무규칙명 ,A.BR_ID AS BR_ID --업무규칙ID ,B.BIZ_AREA_ID --업무영역ID ,B.FULL_PATH AS BIZ_AREA_LNM --업무영역명
,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM --진단대상명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_PNM --진단대상물리명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID --진단대상ID ,S.DB_SCH_PNM AS DB_SCH_PNM --스키마명 ,A.DBC_TBL_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM --테이블명 ,A.DBC_COL_NM AS DBC_COL_NM --컬럼명 ,D.DQI_ID AS DQI_ID --데이터품질지표ID ,DM.FULL_PATH AS DQI_LNM --데이터품질지표명
,C.CTQ_ID AS CTQ_ID --중요정보항목ID ,CM.FULL_PATH AS CTQ_LNM --중요정보항목명
,R.ANA_STR_DTM AS BASE_DTTM --최근측정일자 ,R.ANA_CNT AS ANA_CNT --분석건수 ,R.ER_CNT AS ER_CNT --오류건수 ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(R.ERR_RATE,2)) AS ER_RATE --오류율 ,A.CNT_SQL AS CNT_SQL --건수SQL ,A.ER_CNT_SQL AS ER_CNT_SQL --오류건수SQL ,A.ANA_SQL AS ANA_SQL --분석SQL ,R.ANA_DGR --분석차수 ,DECODE(R.ANA_DGR, NULL, '', R.ANA_DGR||' 차') AS ANA_DGR_DISP --최근실행차수 ,A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID AS BR_CRGP_USER_ID --업무규칙담당자ID ,U.USER_NM AS BR_CRGP_USER_NM ,A.GL_NV AS GL_NV --목표치 ,A.AGR_NV --가중치 ,A.USE_YN --사용여부 ,A.OBJ_DESCN --설명 ,A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID --검증대상명 ,TGT_DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM --검증대상DB명 ,A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM --검증테이블명 ,A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM --검증컬럼명 ,A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM --검증비교KEY컬럼 ,A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL --검증비교값컬럼 ,A.TGT_CNT_SQL --건수SQL(검증) ,A.TGT_ANA_SQL --분석SQL(검증)
,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(R.ER_CNT,R.ANA_CNT)), 2)) AS SIGMA
,A.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM --최초요청일시 ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID --최초요청사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM --최초요청사용자명 ,A.RQST_DTM --요청일시 ,A.RQST_USER_ID --요청사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS RQST_USER_NM --요청사용자명 ,A.APRV_DTM --승인일시 ,A.APRV_USER_ID --승인사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.APRV_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS APRV_USER_NM --승인사용자명
,A.BR_NM AS ETC_JOB_NM ,A.BR_ID AS SHD_JOB_ID ,(CASE WHEN R.ER_CNT IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (CASE WHEN R.ER_CNT = '0' THEN NULL ELSE '#FF0000' END ) END ) AS FontColor FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB INNER JOIN WAM_BR_MSTR A ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP D ON A.BR_ID = D.BR_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DM ON D.DQI_ID = DM.DQI_ID AND DM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON A.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP C ON A.BR_ID = C.BR_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CM ON C.CTQ_ID = CM.CTQ_ID AND CM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND U.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG TGT_DB ON A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = TGT_DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND TGT_DB.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND TGT_DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) R ON A.BR_ID = R.BR_ID WHERE DB.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
AND A.BR_ID = #{brId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}|| '%'
AND B.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND B.BIZ_AREA_ID = #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DM.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CM.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{ctqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND R.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND R.ER_CNT = 0
AND R.ER_CNT <> 0
AND A.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NULL
AND A.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NOT NULL

SELECT M.BR_NM -- 업무규칙명 , S.DB_SCH_LNM -- DB스키마명 , A.BIZ_AREA_LNM -- 업무영역명 , M.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID -- 검증대상명 , M.TGT_DB_SCH_ID -- 검증DB 스키마 , M.OBJ_DESCN -- 설명 , M.OBJ_VERS -- 버전 FROM WAM_BR_MSTR M LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA A ON M.BIZ_AREA_ID = A.BIZ_AREA_ID AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON M.DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
AND M.TGT_DB_SCH_ID LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbConnTrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
ORDER BY M.OBJ_VERS

SELECT M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID -- 검증대상명 , S.DB_SCH_LNM AS TGT_DB_SCH_LNM -- 검증스키마명 , M.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM -- 검증테이블명 FROM WAM_BR_MSTR M LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON M.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND M.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbConnTrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND M.DB_SCH_LNM LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbSchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND M.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbcTblNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND M.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbcColNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
GROUP BY M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, M.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM, S.DB_SCH_LNM

SELECT M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID -- 검증대상명 , S.DB_SCH_LNM AS TGT_DB_SCH_LNM -- 검증스키마명 , M.TGT_DBC_COL_NM -- 검증컬럼명 , M.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM -- 검증키컬럼명 , M.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL -- 검증키컬럼값 FROM WAM_BR_MSTR M LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON M.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND M.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbConnTrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND S.DB_SCH_LNM LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbSchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND M.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbcTblNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND M.TGT_DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%'||#{tgtDbcColNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
GROUP BY M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, S.DB_SCH_LNM, M.TGT_DBC_COL_NM, M.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM, M.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL

SELECT A.BR_NM AS BR_NM -- 업무규칙명 ,A.BR_ID AS BR_ID --업무규칙ID ,B.FULL_PATH AS BIZ_AREA_LNM --업무영역명
,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM --진단대상명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_PNM --진단대상명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID --진단대상ID ,DB.DB_SCH_LNM AS DB_SCH_LNM --스키마명 ,DB.DB_SCH_PNM AS DB_SCH_PNM --스키마명 ,DB.DB_SCH_ID AS DB_SCH_ID --스키마ID ,A.DBC_TBL_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM --테이블명 ,A.DBC_COL_NM AS DBC_COL_NM --컬럼명 ,D.DQI_ID AS DQI_ID --데이터품질지표ID ,DM.FULL_PATH AS DQI_LNM --데이터품질지표명
,C.CTQ_ID AS CTQ_ID --중요정보항목ID ,CM.FULL_PATH AS CTQ_LNM --중요정보항목명
,R.ANA_STR_DTM AS BASE_DTTM --최근측정일자 ,R.ANA_CNT AS ANA_CNT --분석건수 ,R.ER_CNT AS ER_CNT --오류건수 ,R.ERR_RATE AS ER_RATE --오류율 ,A.CNT_SQL AS CNT_SQL --건수SQL ,A.ER_CNT_SQL AS ER_CNT_SQL --오류건수SQL ,A.ANA_SQL AS ANA_SQL --분석SQL ,R.ANA_DGR --분석차수 ,DECODE(R.ANA_DGR, NULL, '', R.ANA_DGR||' 차') AS ANA_DGR_DISP --최근실행차수 ,A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID AS BR_CRGP_USER_ID --업무규칙담당자ID ,U.USER_NM AS BR_CRGP_USER_NM --업무규칙담당자명 ,A.GL_NV AS GL_NV --목표치 ,A.AGR_NV --가중치 ,A.USE_YN --사용여부 ,A.OBJ_DESCN --설명 ,A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID --검증대상명 ,A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM --검증테이블명 ,A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM --검증컬럼명 ,A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM --검증비교KEY컬럼 ,A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL --검증비교값컬럼 ,A.TGT_CNT_SQL --건수SQL(검증) ,A.TGT_ANA_SQL --분석SQL(검증) ,A.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM --최초요청일시 ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID --최초요청사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM --최초요청사용자명 ,A.RQST_DTM --요청일시 ,A.RQST_USER_ID --요청사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS RQST_USER_NM --요청사용자명 ,A.APRV_DTM --승인일시 ,A.APRV_USER_ID --승인사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.APRV_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS APRV_USER_NM --승인사용자명
,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(R.ER_CNT,R.ANA_CNT)), 2)) AS SIGMA FROM WAM_BR_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP D ON A.BR_ID = D.BR_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DM ON D.DQI_ID = DM.DQI_ID AND DM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON A.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP C ON A.BR_ID = C.BR_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CM ON C.CTQ_ID = CM.CTQ_ID AND CM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) R ON A.BR_ID = R.BR_ID
INNER JOIN (SELECT DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,S.DB_SCH_PNM ,S.DB_SCH_LNM ,S.DB_SCH_ID FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) DB ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = DB.DB_SCH_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
AND A.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.BR_ID = #{brId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.BR_ID ,A.BR_NM ,D.DQI_LNM ,C.CTQ_LNM ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.OBJ_VERS ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.RQST_DTM ,A.RQST_USER_ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS RQST_USER_NM
FROM WAM_BR_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP BD ON A.BR_ID = BD.BR_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DQI D ON BD.DQI_ID = D.DQI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP BC ON A.BR_ID = BC.BR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ C ON BC.CTQ_ID = C.CTQ_ID
AND A.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

--이력조회 SELECT M.* ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM --진단대상명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_PNM --진단대상물리명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID --진단대상ID ,BA.BIZ_AREA_ID --업무영역ID ,BA.BIZ_AREA_LNM --업무영역명 ,DMAP.DQI_ID AS DQI_ID --데이터품질지표ID ,DM.FULL_PATH AS DQI_LNM --데이터품질지표명 ,CMAP.CTQ_ID AS CTQ_ID --중요정보항목ID ,CM.FULL_PATH AS CTQ_LNM --중요정보항목명 ,B.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM --요청자명 ,C.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM --최초요청자명 ,D.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM -- 승인자명 FROM (SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') GROUP BY A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM ) DB INNER JOIN WAH_BR_MSTR M ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA BA ON M.BIZ_AREA_ID = BA.BIZ_AREA_ID INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP DMAP ON M.BR_ID = DMAP.BR_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DM ON DMAP.DQI_ID = DM.DQI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP CMAP ON M.BR_ID = CMAP.BR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CM ON CMAP.CTQ_ID = CM.CTQ_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER B ON M.RQST_USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER C ON M.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER D ON M.APRV_USER_ID = D.USER_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE M.BR_ID = #{brId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.*
,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(A.ER_CNT, A.ANA_CNT )),2)) AS SIGMA ,DECODE(A.ANA_CNT,0,0,DECODE(A.ER_CNT,0,100,ROUND(((A.ANA_CNT-A.ER_CNT)/CAST(A.ANA_CNT AS FLOAT)*100),2)))AS ER_RATE FROM ( SELECT BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,BR.ANA_DGR ,BR.ANA_DGR || ' 차' AS ANA_DGR_DISP ,MAX(BR.ANA_STR_DTM) AS ANA_STR_DTM ,SUM(BR.ANA_CNT) AS ANA_CNT ,SUM(BR.ER_CNT) AS ER_CNT
FROM WAM_BR_MSTR BM INNER JOIN WAM_BR_RESULT BR ON BR.BR_ID = BM.BR_ID AND BM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA BIZ ON BM.BIZ_AREA_ID = BIZ.BIZ_AREA_ID AND BIZ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP DQIMAP ON BM.BR_ID = DQIMAP.BR_ID AND DQIMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DQI ON DQIMAP.DQI_ID = DQI.DQI_ID AND DQI.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP CTQMAP ON BM.BR_ID = CTQMAP.BR_ID AND CTQMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CTQ ON CTQMAP.CTQ_ID = CTQ.CTQ_ID AND CTQ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DBC ON BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND BM.DBC_TBL_NM = DBC.DBC_TBL_NM AND BM.DBC_COL_NM = DBC.DBC_COL_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL EX ON EX.DB_SCH_ID = BM.DB_SCH_ID AND EX.DBC_TBL_NM = BM.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE BR.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL AND NVL(EX.EXP_YN, 'N') = 'N'
AND BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND BIZ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND DQI.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CTQ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{ctqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BM.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BR.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NULL
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY BR.ANA_DGR, BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ) A ORDER BY A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM

SELECT A.*
,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(A.ER_CNT, A.ANA_CNT )),2)) AS SIGMA ,DECODE(A.ANA_CNT,0,0,DECODE(A.ER_CNT,0,100,ROUND(((A.ANA_CNT-A.ER_CNT)/CAST(A.ANA_CNT AS FLOAT)*100),2))) ER_RATE FROM (SELECT DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,BIZ.BIZ_AREA_ID ,BIZ.BIZ_AREA_LNM ,BIZ.FULL_PATH ,NVL(SUM(BR.ANA_CNT),0) AS ANA_CNT ,NVL(SUM(BR.ER_CNT), 0) AS ER_CNT ,NVL(COUNT(BM.BR_ID),0) AS BR_CNT FROM WAM_BR_MSTR BM INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA BIZ ON BM.BIZ_AREA_ID = BIZ.BIZ_AREA_ID AND BIZ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP DQIMAP ON BM.BR_ID = DQIMAP.BR_ID AND DQIMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DQI ON DQI.DQI_ID = DQIMAP.DQI_ID AND DQI.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP CTQMAP ON BM.BR_ID = CTQMAP.BR_ID AND CTQMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CTQ ON CTQ.CTQ_ID = CTQMAP.CTQ_ID AND CTQ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) BR ON BM.BR_ID = BR.BR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DBC ON BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND BM.DBC_TBL_NM = DBC.DBC_TBL_NM AND BM.DBC_COL_NM = DBC.DBC_COL_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL EX ON EX.DB_SCH_ID = BM.DB_SCH_ID AND EX.DBC_TBL_NM = BM.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE BM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NVL(EX.EXP_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND ANA_CNT > 0
AND BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND BIZ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND DQI.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CTQ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{ctqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BM.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BR.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NULL
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, BIZ.BIZ_AREA_ID, BIZ.BIZ_AREA_LNM, BIZ.FULL_PATH ) A
ORDER BY DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, FULL_PATH

select Z.* ,ROUND(((GOAL - ER_RATE) /(CASE WHEN ER_RATE = '0' THEN 1 ELSE ER_RATE END))* 100,2) AS ARCH_RATE from ( SELECT A.*
,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(A.ER_CNT, A.ANA_CNT )),2)) AS SIGMA
,ROUND((DECODE(A.ANA_CNT,0,0,DECODE(A.ER_CNT,0,100,ROUND(((A.ANA_CNT-A.ER_CNT)/CAST(A.ANA_CNT AS FLOAT)*100),2)))*A.WEIGHT/100),2) ER_RATE FROM (SELECT DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,DQI.DQI_ID ,DQI.DQI_LNM ,DQI.FULL_PATH ,NVL(SUM(BR.ANA_CNT),0) AS ANA_CNT ,NVL(SUM(BR.ER_CNT), 0) AS ER_CNT ,NVL(COUNT(BM.BR_ID),0) AS BR_CNT ,DQI.WEIGHT ,DQI.GOAL ,BR.ANA_DGR AS ANA_DGR_DISP FROM WAM_BR_MSTR BM INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA BIZ ON BM.BIZ_AREA_ID = BIZ.BIZ_AREA_ID AND BIZ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP DQIMAP ON BM.BR_ID = DQIMAP.BR_ID AND DQIMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DQI ON DQI.DQI_ID = DQIMAP.DQI_ID AND DQI.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP CTQMAP ON BM.BR_ID = CTQMAP.BR_ID AND CTQMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CTQ ON CTQ.CTQ_ID = CTQMAP.CTQ_ID AND CTQ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) BR ON BM.BR_ID = BR.BR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DBC ON BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND BM.DBC_TBL_NM = DBC.DBC_TBL_NM AND BM.DBC_COL_NM = DBC.DBC_COL_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL EX ON EX.DB_SCH_ID = BM.DB_SCH_ID AND EX.DBC_TBL_NM = BM.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE BM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NVL(EX.EXP_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND ANA_CNT > 0
AND BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND BIZ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND DQI.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CTQ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{ctqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BM.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BR.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NULL
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, DQI.DQI_ID, DQI.DQI_LNM, DQI.FULL_PATH, DQI.WEIGHT ) A
ORDER BY DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, FULL_PATH ) Z

SELECT A.*
,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(A.ER_CNT, A.ANA_CNT )),2)) AS SIGMA ,DECODE(A.ANA_CNT,0,0,DECODE(A.ER_CNT,0,100,ROUND(((A.ANA_CNT-A.ER_CNT)/CAST(A.ANA_CNT AS FLOAT)*100),2))) ER_RATE FROM (SELECT DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,CTQ.CTQ_ID ,CTQ.CTQ_LNM ,CTQ.FULL_PATH ,NVL(SUM(BR.ANA_CNT),0) AS ANA_CNT ,NVL(SUM(BR.ER_CNT), 0) AS ER_CNT ,NVL(COUNT(BM.BR_ID),0) AS BR_CNT FROM WAM_BR_MSTR BM INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA BIZ ON BM.BIZ_AREA_ID = BIZ.BIZ_AREA_ID AND BIZ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP DQIMAP ON BM.BR_ID = DQIMAP.BR_ID AND DQIMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DQI ON DQI.DQI_ID = DQIMAP.DQI_ID AND DQI.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP CTQMAP ON BM.BR_ID = CTQMAP.BR_ID AND CTQMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_CTQ CTQ ON CTQ.CTQ_ID = CTQMAP.CTQ_ID AND CTQ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) BR ON BM.BR_ID = BR.BR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DBC ON BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND BM.DBC_TBL_NM = DBC.DBC_TBL_NM AND BM.DBC_COL_NM = DBC.DBC_COL_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL EX ON EX.DB_SCH_ID = BM.DB_SCH_ID AND EX.DBC_TBL_NM = BM.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE BM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NVL(EX.EXP_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND ANA_CNT > 0
AND BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND BIZ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND DQI.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CTQ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{ctqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BM.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BR.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NULL
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, CTQ.CTQ_ID, CTQ.CTQ_LNM, CTQ.FULL_PATH ) A
ORDER BY DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, FULL_PATH

SELECT A.BR_NM AS BR_NM -- 업무규칙명 ,A.BR_ID AS BR_ID --업무규칙ID ,B.BIZ_AREA_ID --업무영역ID ,B.FULL_PATH AS BIZ_AREA_LNM --업무영역명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM --진단대상명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_PNM --진단대상물리명 ,DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS DB_CONN_TRG_ID --진단대상ID ,A.DBC_TBL_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM --테이블명 ,A.DBC_COL_NM AS DBC_COL_NM --컬럼명 ,D.DQI_ID AS DQI_ID --데이터품질지표ID ,DM.FULL_PATH AS DQI_LNM --데이터품질지표명
,C.CTQ_ID AS CTQ_ID --중요정보항목ID ,CM.FULL_PATH AS CTQ_LNM --중요정보항목명
,R.ANA_STR_DTM AS BASE_DTTM --최근측정일자 ,R.ANA_CNT AS ANA_CNT --분석건수 ,R.ER_CNT AS ER_CNT --오류건수 ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(R.ERR_RATE,2)) AS ER_RATE --오류율 ,A.CNT_SQL AS CNT_SQL --건수SQL ,A.ER_CNT_SQL AS ER_CNT_SQL --오류건수SQL ,A.ANA_SQL AS ANA_SQL --분석SQL ,R.ANA_DGR --분석차수 ,DECODE(R.ANA_DGR, NULL, '', R.ANA_DGR||' 차') AS ANA_DGR_DISP --최근실행차수 ,A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID AS BR_CRGP_USER_ID --업무규칙담당자ID ,U.USER_NM AS BR_CRGP_USER_NM ,A.GL_NV AS GL_NV --목표치 ,A.AGR_NV --가중치 ,A.USE_YN --사용여부 ,A.OBJ_DESCN --설명 ,A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID --검증대상명 ,TGT_DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM --검증대상DB명 ,A.TGT_DBC_TBL_NM --검증테이블명 ,A.TGT_DBC_COL_NM --검증컬럼명 ,A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_NM --검증비교KEY컬럼 ,A.TGT_KEY_DBC_COL_VAL --검증비교값컬럼 ,A.TGT_CNT_SQL --건수SQL(검증) ,A.TGT_ANA_SQL --분석SQL(검증)
,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(R.ER_CNT,R.ANA_CNT)), 2)) AS SIGMA
,A.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM --최초요청일시 ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID --최초요청사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM --최초요청사용자명 ,A.RQST_DTM --요청일시 ,A.RQST_USER_ID --요청사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.RQST_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS RQST_USER_NM --요청사용자명 ,A.APRV_DTM --승인일시 ,A.APRV_USER_ID --승인사용자ID ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.APRV_USER_ID AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')) AS APRV_USER_NM --승인사용자명
,A.BR_NM AS ETC_JOB_NM ,A.BR_ID AS SHD_JOB_ID ,(CASE WHEN R.ER_CNT IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (CASE WHEN R.ER_CNT = '0' THEN NULL ELSE '#FF0000' END ) END ) AS FontColor FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB INNER JOIN WAM_BR_MSTR A ON DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP D ON A.BR_ID = D.BR_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DM ON D.DQI_ID = DM.DQI_ID AND DM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON A.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP C ON A.BR_ID = C.BR_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CM ON C.CTQ_ID = CM.CTQ_ID AND CM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.BR_CRGP_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND U.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG TGT_DB ON A.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = TGT_DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND TGT_DB.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND TGT_DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT R.* , CASE WHEN R.ANA_CNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(R.ER_CNT*100/R.ANA_CNT,2) END AS ERR_RATE FROM WAM_BR_RESULT R INNER JOIN (SELECT BR_ID, MAX(ANA_STR_DTM) AS ANA_STR_DTM FROM WAM_BR_RESULT
GROUP BY BR_ID ) R2 ON R.BR_ID = R2.BR_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = R2.ANA_STR_DTM ) R ON A.BR_ID = R.BR_ID WHERE DB.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231000000','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.BR_ID IN ('${brId}')

SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,A.DQI_ID ,A.DQI_LNM ,A.FULL_PATH ,A.ANA_CNT ,A.ER_CNT ,A.BR_CNT ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(A.ER_CNT, A.ANA_CNT )),2)) AS SIGMA ,(DECODE(A.ANA_CNT,0,0,DECODE(A.ER_CNT,0,100,ROUND(((A.ANA_CNT-A.ER_CNT)/A.ANA_CNT*100),2)))*A.WEIGHT) ER_RATE ,'PROFILE' AS ANA_TYP FROM (SELECT DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,DQI.DQI_ID ,DQI.DQI_LNM ,DQI.FULL_PATH ,NVL(SUM(PR.ANA_CNT),0) AS ANA_CNT ,NVL(SUM(PR.ESN_ER_CNT), 0) AS ER_CNT ,NVL(COUNT(PM.PRF_ID),0) AS BR_CNT ,DQI.WEIGHT FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR PM INNER JOIN WAM_PRF_DQI_MAP DQIMAP ON PM.PRF_ID = DQIMAP.PRF_ID AND DQIMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DQI ON DQI.DQI_ID = DQIMAP.DQI_ID AND DQI.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) PR ON PM.PRF_ID = PR.PRF_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DBC ON PM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND PM.DBC_TBL_NM = DBC.DBC_TBL_NM AND PM.OBJ_NM = DBC.DBC_COL_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL EX ON EX.DB_SCH_ID = PM.DB_SCH_ID AND EX.DBC_TBL_NM = PM.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE PM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NVL(EX.EXP_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND ANA_CNT > 0
AND PM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND DQI.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND PM.PRF_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BR.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, DQI.DQI_ID, DQI.DQI_LNM, DQI.FULL_PATH, DQI.WEIGHT ) A UNION ALL SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,A.DQI_ID ,A.DQI_LNM ,A.FULL_PATH ,A.ANA_CNT ,A.ER_CNT ,A.BR_CNT ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(WDQ_FC_SIGMA(WDQ_FC_DPMO(A.ER_CNT, A.ANA_CNT )),2)) AS SIGMA ,(DECODE(A.ANA_CNT,0,0,DECODE(A.ER_CNT,0,100,ROUND(((A.ANA_CNT-A.ER_CNT)/A.ANA_CNT*100),2)))*A.WEIGHT) ER_RATE ,'BIZRULE' AS ANA_TYP FROM (SELECT DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ,DQI.DQI_ID ,DQI.DQI_LNM ,DQI.FULL_PATH ,NVL(SUM(BR.ANA_CNT),0) AS ANA_CNT ,NVL(SUM(BR.ER_CNT), 0) AS ER_CNT ,NVL(COUNT(BM.BR_ID),0) AS BR_CNT ,DQI.WEIGHT FROM WAM_BR_MSTR BM INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA BIZ ON BM.BIZ_AREA_ID = BIZ.BIZ_AREA_ID AND BIZ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_BR_DQI_MAP DQIMAP ON BM.BR_ID = DQIMAP.BR_ID AND DQIMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DQI DQI ON DQI.DQI_ID = DQIMAP.DQI_ID AND DQI.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_BR_CTQ_MAP CTQMAP ON BM.BR_ID = CTQMAP.BR_ID AND CTQMAP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CTQ CTQ ON CTQ.CTQ_ID = CTQMAP.CTQ_ID AND CTQ.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) BR ON BM.BR_ID = BR.BR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) DBC ON BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND BM.DBC_TBL_NM = DBC.DBC_TBL_NM AND BM.DBC_COL_NM = DBC.DBC_COL_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL EX ON EX.DB_SCH_ID = BM.DB_SCH_ID AND EX.DBC_TBL_NM = BM.DBC_TBL_NM WHERE BM.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NVL(EX.EXP_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND ANA_CNT > 0
AND BM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR DBC.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND BIZ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{bizAreaLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND DQI.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CTQ.FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{ctqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BM.BR_NM LIKE '%' || #{brNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND BR.ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NULL
AND BM.TGT_VRF_JOIN_CD IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DBC.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, DQI.DQI_ID, DQI.DQI_LNM, DQI.FULL_PATH, DQI.WEIGHT ) A
ORDER BY DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, FULL_PATH, ANA_TYP
